Plot: A woman is kidnapped by a stranger on a routine flight. Threatened by the potential murder of her father, she is pulled into a plot to assist her captor in offing a politician.
Title: Red Eye
Writer: Carl Ellsworth (screenplay), Carl Ellsworth (story), Dan Foos (story)
Actors: Rachel McAdams, Cillian Murphy, Brian Cox, Laura Johnson
tomatoConsensus: With solid performances and tight direction from Wes Craven, Red Eye is a brisk, economic thriller.
